name: Destruction
description: Harnessing the energies of fire, frost, or shock. Destruction is the main offensive for mages.

name: Restoration
description: Harnessing life forces to heal and protect the user, useful for any archetype.

name: Alteration
description: Focuses on manipulating the physical world to grant the user superhuman abilities.

name: Conjuration
description: Teaches the user to manipulate souls in order to summon creatues or raise the undead.

name: Illusion
description: Teaches the user to control the will and perception of other beings.

name: Enchanting
description: Focuses on arcane crafting of magical improvements to items.
